backend/main.mo: Motoko canister handling user profiles, registrations, OTP generation/verification, and admin auth with access control and blob storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing splash screen text update, galaxy background addition, and related styling updates with associated files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing major frontend files for registration, admin features, styling, hooks, and configuration.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind/OKLCH theme variables and base styles including dark mode and layout-level CSS rules.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry page defining metadata, Orbitron font, and root mount point for the frontend app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top-level React app handling splash screen flow and switching between registration flow and admin panel.
frontend/src/components/SplashScreen.tsx: Animated splash screen with galaxy background, company title, reduced-motion support, auto-dismiss timer, and skip button.
frontend/src/features/admin/AdminPanel.t: Admin panel component managing authentication, admin setup, registration viewing/editing, and role-based behavior.
frontend/src/features/admin/components/A: UI card enabling admin access recovery through code application or username/password login with state handling for errors and loading.
React error boundary that catches rendering errors in admin detail panels and shows a retryable error UI.
frontend/src/features/admin/components/D: Component that loads and displays document images with loading, error handling, retries, and a placeholder when missing.
frontend/src/features/admin/components/E: Form for editing registration details with controlled state, validation, and save/cancel handling.
frontend/src/features/admin/components/R: Panel displaying registration details with multiple UI states including empty, loading, error, view, and edit modes plus delete support.
frontend/src/features/admin/hooks/useAdm: React Query mutation hook for admin password login with backend error normalization and post-login query invalidation.
Provides React Query hooks for admin checks, user role, registrations, and resilient registration-with-receipt fetching.
Applies an admin setup code, stores it in session, and invalidates/refetches admin-related queries.
frontend/src/features/registration/compo: Error boundary that displays a fallback UI and refresh option when a registration step fails.
frontend/src/features/registration/hooks: Defines mutations for OTP generation, OTP verification, and submitting registration data with file uploads.
frontend/src/features/registration/Regis: Controls the multi-step registration flow, managing step state, validation, and transitions.
frontend/src/features/registration/steps: Renders and validates customer details form fields, reporting validity changes upward.
Handles OTP generation, verification, and final registration submission with success feedback.
Displays terms acceptance UI, tracks agreement state, and generates printable proof with customer info and timestamp.
Handles Aadhaar, PAN, and optional payment receipt uploads with previews and validation triggering.
frontend/src/features/registration/terms: Provides static terms and conditions sections with router and service policies.
frontend/src/features/registration/types: Defines TypeScript interfaces for customer details, document data, and step props.
frontend/src/features/registration/valid: Validates customer details fields including required text, phone, age, email, and address rules.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, invalidating related queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity auth context, handling login, stored identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, light/dark themes, admin panel theme, and splash screen animations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app with React, QueryClient, and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters (including hash-based), store them in sessionStorage, retrieve persisted values, and clear them from storage or the URL hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Defines Tailwind CSS setup with dark mode, content paths, typography and animation plugins, and an extended theme including fonts, colors, radii, shadows, and keyframes.
project_state.json: Contains the projectâ€™s current build state, requirements, architectural notes, known issues, and feature metadata for the customer registration app.
